name: Ultramarine
summary: Ultramarine is a blue gothic/industrial level using modified Quake3 textures. It takes the medieval/castle theme to another height in originality blue panels and light grey concrete brick. A trademark twisting layout that weaves through this large level as you enter and eventually exit the castle in a tough end battle. Custom monsters come included with Axeman, Gremlins, Rocket and Nail Ogres and the tough Baron gang
